articles.author: Erica Werner
articles.title: Actors, writers fill Los Angeles streets in show of unity amid strike - The Washington Post
articles.description: Members of the Writers Guild of America have been on strike for 135 days and the Screen Actors Guild for 62 days. Talks between the WGA and the group representing major studios and streaming services have broken down.
articles.content:

LOS ANGELES Thousands of striking actors and writers flooded the streets of Hollywood on Wednesday in a massive show of unity aimed at pressuring studios to give in an… [+3849 chars]
